alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 31 at 12:04PM CST until January 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT CST SATURDAY NIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Locally higher amounts are possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from midnight tonight to midnight CST Saturday night. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult from. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Expect areas of drifting snow. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
